meta.title: Prytula Foundation Training Center | Professional Military Training
meta.description: Professional military training: FPV drones, interceptors, tactical medicine. Full cycle from training to equipment supply. Free for Armed Forces of Ukraine.

hero.subtitle: Prytula Foundation Training Center prepares military personnel in FPV drones, interceptors, and tactical medicine. Full cycle: from training to equipment supply.

about.label: About us
about.title: About Training Center
about.paragraph1: Prytula Foundation Training Center is a unique ecosystem for professional military training. We don't just teach — we provide a full cycle: from theory to practice, from training to equipment supply to the frontlines.
about.paragraph2: Our courses are developed together with experienced instructors and military personnel who have real combat experience. Each graduate receives not only knowledge and skills, but also modern equipment for combat missions.
about.paragraph3: Since our launch, we have trained over 100 cadets who successfully apply their skills on the frontlines. Our mission is to make Ukraine's army the most technologically equipped and professional.

ecosystem.title: Foundation Ecosystem
ecosystem.description: Part of the large Prytula Foundation ecosystem with access to resources and partner network
